original: @191a * // lha mo gdugs dkar mo'i mngon spyod kyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas /
analyzed: @191a * // lha mo gdugs dkar mo'i mngon spyod kyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas /
translated: One who wishes to perform the rite of violent action of the goddess White Umbrella

original: nad dang gdon la sogs pa dang por sa gzhi yang gdub cing gas pa dang / rtsub pa la thab khung zur gsum ngos re la khru re yod pa la zabs su khru phyed pa bya ste /
analyzed: nad dang gdon la sogs pa dang por sa gzhi yang gdub cing gas pa dang / rtsub pa la thab khung zur gsum ngos re la khru re yod pa la zabs su khru phyed pa bya ste /
translated: should first make the ground of the patient afflicted by sickness, spirits, and so on uneven, cracked, and rough, and make a hearth with three corners, one cubit on each side, and half a cubit deep.

original: dbus su 'khor lo la rdo rjes mchan ba /
analyzed: dbus su 'khor lo la rdo rjes mchan ba /
translated: In the center, there is a wheel marked with a vajra.

original: kha yang rdo rjes bskor ba /
analyzed: kha yang rdo rjes bskor ba /
translated: The mouth is also surrounded by vajras.

original: sa gzhi yang dug dang khrag la sogs pa nag por byugs te /
analyzed: sa gzhi yang dug dang khrag la sogs pa nag por byugs te /
translated: The ground is smeared with black substances such as poison and blood.

original: me tog nag po dang 'bru nag pos gtor ro //
analyzed: me tog nag po dang 'bru nag pos gtor ro //
translated: It is scattered with black flowers and black grains.

original: de nas drag po'i mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la /
analyzed: de nas drag po'i mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la /
translated: Then, having arranged the fierce offerings and bali,ðŸ”½the fierce substancesâ€”blood, poison,ðŸ”½linga,

original: drag po'i rdzas khrag dang dug dang lingga dang / ske tshe dang / rdo phye lcags phye /
analyzed: drag po'i rdzas khrag dang dug dang lingga dang / ske tshe dang / rdo phye lcags phye /
translated: black mustard seed, stone dust, iron dust,

original: zir bra'o nag po /
analyzed: zir bra'o nag po /
translated: black aconite,

original: sran ma nag po /
analyzed: sran ma nag po /
translated: black beansâ€”

original: de ltar rdzas bshams nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdzas bshams nas /
translated: are arranged.

original: bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas la thab dang rdzas rnams stong par bsams te /
analyzed: bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas la thab dang rdzas rnams stong par bsams te /
translated: Having performed the deity yoga, one should visualize the hearth and the substances as empty.

original: dzam las thab khung gru gsum pa bskyed pa'i nang du /
analyzed: dzam las thab khung gru gsum pa bskyed pa'i nang du /
translated: From the syllable JAH, one should generate a triangular hearth in the middle of the mandala.

original: cho ga gsum gyis gdugs dkar mo 'khor dang bcas pa drag po'i lhar bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga gsum gyis gdugs dkar mo 'khor dang bcas pa drag po'i lhar bskyed par bya'o //
translated: In the center of that, one should generate the Awareness Being, Usnisacakravartin, together with the retinue, by means of the three rites.

original: de'i mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te bzhugs su gsol nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
analyzed: de'i mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te bzhugs su gsol nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
translated: In the space in front of that, one should invite the Gnosis Being together with the retinue and request them to sit. Having made offerings and praises,

original: sreg rdzas rnams yum gyi sngags kyi tha mar m'a ra ya btags te /
analyzed: sreg rdzas rnams yum gyi sngags kyi tha mar m'a ra ya btags te /
translated: one should offer the burnt offerings, adding MARAYA to the end of the mantra of the Mother.

original: khrag dang dug la sogs pas lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: khrag dang dug la sogs pas lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du dbul bar bya'o //
translated: One should offer blood, poison, and so forth, seven or twenty-one times.

original: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la bzod par gsol ba la sogs pa rnams bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la bzod par gsol ba la sogs pa rnams bya'o //
translated: Then, having made offerings and praises, one should request forbearance and so forth.

original: de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang / dam tshig sems dpa' bsdus nas @191b rang nyid la bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang / dam tshig sems dpa' bsdus nas @191b rang nyid la bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: Then, after the Gnosis Being has departed, one should gather the Awareness Being and protect oneself.

original: de lta bu de yang gang zhig tshar mchod kyi bar du lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu de yang gang zhig tshar mchod kyi bar du lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o //
translated: Such a rite should be performed seven or twenty-one times, until the victim is destroyed.

original: mngon spyod kyi las slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: mngon spyod kyi las slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The rite of destruction composed by the master Candragomin is complete.
